includedAssets.title: A Danger To Himself And Others
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep1 - A Danger To Himself And Others
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma and Dylan begin to worry about the missing Norman, while Romero considers a surprising proposition.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norma and Dylan begin to worry about the missing Norman, while Romero considers a surprising proposition.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norma and Dylan begin to worry about the missing Norman, while Romero considers a surprising proposition.

includedAssets.title: Goodnight, Mother
includedAssets.synopsis: While Romero works to have him re-institutionalised, a confused Norman grows suspicious of Norma as he tries to remember the previous night.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Romero works to have him re-institutionalised, a confused Norman grows suspicious of Norma as he tries to remember the previous night.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Romero works to have him re-institutionalised, a confused Norman grows suspicious of Norma as he tries to remember the previous night.

includedAssets.title: 'Til Death Do You Part
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep3 - 'Til Death Do You Part
includedAssets.synopsis: Romero and Norma take a big step, while Norman attempts to open up to his therapist without implicating his mother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Romero and Norma take a big step, while Norman attempts to open up to his therapist without implicating his mother.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Romero and Norma take a big step, while Norman attempts to open up to his therapist without implicating his mother.

includedAssets.title: Lights Of Winter
includedAssets.synopsis: As Norman attempts to break out of Pineview with a fellow patient, Norma grows increasingly happy in her 'marriage' to Romero.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Norman attempts to break out of Pineview with a fellow patient, Norma grows increasingly happy in her 'marriage' to Romero.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Norman attempts to break out of Pineview with a fellow patient, Norma grows increasingly happy in her 'marriage' to Romero.

includedAssets.title: Refraction
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman tries to open up to Dr Edwards, Norma and Romero attempt to clean up the motel and a repairman learns a Bates family secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norman tries to open up to Dr Edwards, Norma and Romero attempt to clean up the motel and a repairman learns a Bates family secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norman tries to open up to Dr Edwards, Norma and Romero attempt to clean up the motel and a repairman learns a Bates family secret.

includedAssets.title: The Vault
includedAssets.synopsis: Dr. Edwards tries to explain Norman's condition to him, Romero attempts to break away from Rebecca and Norma fights to keep her secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dr. Edwards tries to explain Norman's condition to him, Romero attempts to break away from Rebecca and Norma fights to keep her secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dr. Edwards tries to explain Norman's condition to him, Romero attempts to break away from Rebecca and Norma fights to keep her secret.

includedAssets.title: There's No Place Like Home
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - There's No Place Like Home
includedAssets.synopsis: A sudden discovery motivates Norman to find a way to go home, Dylan looks for Audrey and Romero tries to help Norma.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A sudden discovery motivates Norman to find a way to go home, Dylan looks for Audrey and Romero tries to help Norma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A sudden discovery motivates Norman to find a way to go home, Dylan looks for Audrey and Romero tries to help Norma.

includedAssets.title: Unfaithful
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma finds herself caught between her son and Romero. Meanwhile, Norman tries to adjust to everything that has changed since he left.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norma finds herself caught between her son and Romero. Meanwhile, Norman tries to adjust to everything that has changed since he left.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norma finds herself caught between her son and Romero. Meanwhile, Norman tries to adjust to everything that has changed since he left.

includedAssets.title: Forever
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma struggles as Dylan and Romero begin to worry that Norman's presence is putting her in danger.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norma struggles as Dylan and Romero begin to worry that Norman's presence is putting her in danger.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norma struggles as Dylan and Romero begin to worry that Norman's presence is putting her in danger.

includedAssets.title: Norman
includedAssets.synopsis: Romero and Norman argue over what happened to Norma, while events begin to strain Norman's mind to breaking point. Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Romero and Norman argue over what happened to Norma, while events begin to strain Norman's mind to breaking point. Season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Romero and Norman argue over what happened to Norma, while events begin to strain Norman's mind to breaking point. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As the influence of "Mother" grows, Norman finds himself battling with Romero over his family's future. Chilling prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the influence of "Mother" grows, Norman finds himself battling with Romero over his family's future. Chilling prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the influence of "Mother" grows, Norman finds himself battling with Romero over his family's future. Chilling prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho.

includedIn.title: Bates Motel
includedIn.synopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Things don't go to plan however, as the pair are forced to hide a grave secret while coping with Norman's deteriorating.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel.
